Articles.Content:
I'm interested in using a mod for this in an upcoming cinematic of mine.  I think I remember a mod that does this similarly to VaporVent, with toggleable parts that create the aero FX, but I can't remember its name for some reason.  Am I going crazy or does a mod for this exist?

Thanks!

EDIT: Thought a picture of what I'm looking for would be useful.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saturn_V#/media/File:Apollo_11_launch.jpg

Edited September 26, 2022 by Entropian
